    burtis.modules.simulation.models  

    • Uses of NoSuchBusStopException in burtis.modules.simulation.models

      Methods in burtis.modules.simulation.models that throw NoSuchBusStopException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BusStop BusStopManager.busStopExists(BusStop busStop)
      Checks if given bus stop exists.
      void Bus.depart(java.lang.String requestedBusStopName)
      Function that orders bus depart from the bus stop.
      void Terminus.departBus()
      Checks if bus should depart at current iteration and if so orders it to go.
      If bus is available at the terminus is ordered to go.
      private void BusManager.departBus(int busId, java.lang.String nextBusStopName)
      Calls Bus.depart(String) at bus of given id, with bus stop name parameter.
      BusStop BusStopManager.getBusStopByName(java.lang.String name)
      Searches for a bus stop with given name.
      BusStop BusStopManager.getNextBusStop(BusStop currentBusStop)
      Searches for bus stop next to the one given as argument.
      void Bus.omitBusStop()
      Function that makes bus omit nearest bus stop.
      void BusManager.processBusDeparturesList(java.util.List<BusDepartureInfo> departureList)
      Sends buses to terminus or departs them to next bus stop if appropriate.
      void Bus.processQueryResult()
      Processes query (waiting passengers at bus stop) result.
      void BusManager.processWaitingPassengersQueryResponse(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> response)
      Sets response bits in bus objects and triggers response processing on every bus that requested information.
      void BusManager.sendFromDepot(int busId)
      Sets bus to start at next iteration after arriving from the depot.
      void Bus.updateBusPosition()
      Updates bus position and checks bus stop interaction.
      void BusManager.updateBusPositions()
      Executes Bus.updateBusPosition() on every bus.
